markdownRemark.html: In this project I was given a website design in PDF form and recreated it with HTML and CSS. Though it is not my actual profile website, I used it to demenstrate my abilities in responsive design. I used a mobile first aproach when putting this page together.

frontmatter.title: Build a Portfolio Site Project
frontmatter.description: A mock website created for Udacity's Front-End Nanodegree program.
